inventory_type.description: Determines whether to replace the items from the inventory of the entity or the inventory of a power present in the entity.
inventory_type.markdownDescription: Determines whether to replace the items from the inventory of the entity or the inventory of a power present in the entity.

entity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the entity *_before_* the items are replaced.
entity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the entity *_before_* the items are replaced.

item_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on the affected items *_after_* the affected items are replaced.
item_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on the affected items *_after_* the affected items are replaced.

item_condition.description: If specified, only items which fulfill this condition will be replaced.
item_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, only items which fulfill this condition will be replaced.

slot.description: If specified, only items in the designated slot will be replaced.
slot.markdownDescription: If specified, only items in the designated slot will be replaced.

slots.description: If specified, only items in the designated slots will be replaced.
slots.markdownDescription: If specified, only items in the designated slots will be replaced.

power.description: If specified, the items in the inventory of this power will be replaced instead of the items in the entity's inventory if `inventory_type` is set to `"power"`.
power.markdownDescription: If specified, the items in the inventory of this power will be replaced instead of the items in the entity's inventory if `inventory_type` is set to `"power"`.

stack.description: The item to use as a replacement for the affected items.
stack.markdownDescription: The item to use as a replacement for the affected items.

merge_nbt.description: Determines whether to merge the NBTs of the item that will be replaced and the NBTs of the item that will be used as a replacement.
merge_nbt.markdownDescription: Determines whether to merge the NBTs of the item that will be replaced and the NBTs of the item that will be used as a replacement.

type.description:
## Replace Inventory --- [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/replace_inventory) Replaces the items from either the entity's inventory or a power that uses the [Inventory (Power Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/replace_inventory). Type ID: `origins:replace_inventory` --- ### Examples ```json "entity_action": { "type": "origins:replace_inventory", "slot": "weapon.offhand", "stack": { "item": "minecraft:barrier" } } ``` This example will replace the item in the entity's offhand with a Barrier item.
```json "entity_action": { "type": "origins:replace_inventory", "inventory_type": "power", "power": "origins:extra_inventory", "stack": { "item": "minecraft:air" } } ``` This example will clear the contents of the `origins:extra_inventory` power by replacing all the items with Air.
